comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Welcome to the forum for bringing a new casino here.You'll need to purchase a account copper member in order to post images that will look more appealing than text.The name of the casino is almost the same as another casino, namely Punt.com but in terms of the interface it is also different, maybe a coincidence. lolI want to ask after reading the FAQ at this casino, so every withdrawal will require KYC, and the withdrawal limit of $2,500 per day and $7,500 per week also requires 7 working days, so what is the minimum withdrawal, is it at least under $100 not required KYC ?Quote from: https://www.puntcasino.com/frequently-asked-questionsAre there rules for withdrawing funds?Yes, but nothing too serious. The maximum withdrawal per day is currently $2,500 and $7,500 per week. Your withdrawal will be paid out within 7 business days of the withdrawal request. Also, make sure you have wagered funds before requesting a withdrawal, as this is in line with anti-money laundering policies.You will need to provide a photo I.D. and proof of residence when requesting your cashout, so make sure you have these on hand to speed up the process.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: Solosanz on September 28, 2022, 02:32:11 PMI think @OP need a clarification does punt.com and puntcasino.com are actually controlled by a same company? the reason is they wrote reintroducing  which mean they have been here before. But looking at the casino both of them are completely different and punt.com is still active.As far as I can see, punt.com and puntcasino.com aren't operated by the same company. Punt.com is owned by Tiger Ridge Group N.V. and Puntcasino.com is operated by Effice Group N.V. The UI of both casinos are completely different. Perhaps, it is just a coincidence to see two casinos with similar keyword (similar domain name).Quote from: Solosanz on September 28, 2022, 02:32:11 PMI check the site you have Curacao license, but the terms didn't mention the site will ask KYC to their customers, I only find personal details which I think just email and password information, no? another thing is you're only allow people who at least 21 years old, while most casinos allow at least 17 years old.KYC verification is mandatory at Puntcasino.com. You won't be able to withdraw your funds without submitting your personal documents.

comments.author: StakeGG
comments.body: As many users have already mentioned it would be wise to re-brand your casino as a more established casino with the domain punt.com exists. As a marketing student it would greatly help your advertising campaigns on Bitcointalk if you had a distinct memorable name like Stake, Punt, Rollbit, etc rather than copying a brand name of another casino.I'd recommend editing the OP to clarify you are not associated with Punt.com as there may be some confusion amongst seasoned bettors.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: So, the casino accept up to 6BTC for bonus ($120,000) but they limit your win to x10...QuoteMaximum Withdrawal: Is determined solely by the amount of the deposit.For example, you deposit $100 and redeem a 10 x max cash out coupon. The maximum you are eligible to withdrawal is, ($100 x 10) $1,000.And that's not the worst part guys... your money will get stuck in the casino for months.QuoteA maximum withdrawal of $2,500 will be approved per 24-hour period. Ineligible requests will be denied within that time frame, with a maximum of 3 withdrawals per a 7-day rolling period.Source: https://www.puntcasino.com/terms-and-conditions

comments.author: Punt.com
comments.body: We have had many users reach out to us today and ask if we are affiliated with this new website. I would like to let everyone know that Punt.com is not affiliated with this platform.

I would like to let everyone know that Punt.com is not affiliated with this platform.Finally the confusion that arose with the platform punt casino and punt.com is clarified. Both are separate platforms having their own terms and conditions. Good is to do your own research and make initial deposit. However few users could land on any of the platform due to the Casinos having more similarity in the name.
